wikipedia_page.main: Lawrence McAllister Urquhart (born 24 September 1935) is a Scottish businessman and formerly the chairman of Burmah Castrol, Scottish Widows, British airports operator BAA Limited, and a director of Lloyds TSB, Imerys and Kleinwort Benson.A native Scot, he was educated at Strathallan School and King's College London (LLB). He is qualified as a solicitor and chartered accountant.He is married to Elizabeth (born 1937) and has four children.

response: * Lawrence Urquhart (born 1935), former Chairman of Burmah Castrol, Scottish Widows and BAA Limited.
